pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, November 2, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, November 2 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Rio 2016 Team Canada Sport Fair with the Minister of Sport and Persons with Disabilities, Carla Qualtrough, and will deliver remarks.

Montpetit Hall gymnasium
University of Ottawa
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:20 a.m. and should present themselves to room 103


10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Olympic Day Reception with the Minister of Sport and Persons with Disabilities, Carla Qualtrough, and will deliver brief remarks.

Reading Room
237-C, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage 


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
